posts.post_content: [Morphling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Morphling) is the number one creature ever printed in "Magic." In second place, [Masticore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Masticore). If you built a deck when urza's block was in standard, you put at least 2 of these bad boys in there. The same way everyone used [Cursed Scroll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cursed Scroll). It's colorless so it can go into every deck, and it did when it was in standard.
